definition: east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
(used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou

sentences.english: Every country in Eastern Europe took at least one step to make things easier for business.
sentences.chinese: 东欧各国都为简化商业手续至少采取了一项措施。

sentences.english: What we are witnessing might in the end be on a par with the swift and sudden collapse of the communist dictatorships of Eastern Europe.
sentences.chinese: 而最后等待我们的是政权的迅速瓦解，其状必如东欧。

sentences.english: He blasted East European critics as 'collaborators with Fascism.
sentences.chinese: 他指责东欧的评论家为“极端国家主义的同谋”。

sentences.english: In the west, a Mongol army invaded eastern Europe .
sentences.chinese: 在西方，一支蒙古军队入侵东欧。

sentences.english: Yedisan Tatars traded there in the 14th century.
sentences.chinese: 十四世纪，东欧的鞑靼人在此从事贸易。

sentences.english: Only east European countries such as Russia, have higher rates of drinking than the UK.
sentences.chinese: 只有像俄罗斯等东欧国家才有比英国更高的饮酒率。

sentences.english: In Eastern Europe, you’ll find tempting deals on accommodation and have many tourist sights to yourself.
sentences.chinese: 在东欧，你会发现膳宿极为合算，景点众多。

sentences.english: People in Eastern European countries and some latino cultures prefer shorter handshakes, too.
sentences.chinese: 东欧以及拉丁文化中，人们也喜欢稍短的握手礼。

sentences.english: We export to Eastern Europe and the Far East.
sentences.chinese: 我们的产品出口到东欧和远东国家。

sentences.english: The revolution wasn't however successful and papal power was restored by a Europeen coalition.
sentences.chinese: 但革命没有成功，教皇的权力由一个东欧联盟恢复。

sentences.english: My great-grandparents were Jewish immigrants from Eastern Europe.
sentences.chinese: 我的曾祖父曾祖母是来自东欧的犹太移民。

sentences.english: It is difficult for Central and Southern Europe to resurge in the short term.
sentences.chinese: 中东欧经济短期内难以东山再起。

sentences.english: This time Southeast Asia and Latin America are ceding the dishonors to Eastern Europe.
sentences.chinese: 这次，东南亚和拉丁美洲在看东欧的笑话。

sentences.english: Heo YoungSaeng, Flooded by invites to Turkey, Eastern Europe.
sentences.chinese: 许永生，被盛情邀请到访土耳其，东欧等地。

sentences.english: Pictures of the occasion were placarded throughout Eastern Europe.
sentences.chinese: 这个场面的照片张贴在东欧各处。

sentences.english: First, foster new highlights in China-Central and Eastern Europe cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 第一，打造中国与中东欧合作新亮点。

definition: Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
Latin America/abbr. for 拉丁美洲
